main_business: IT Asset Disposition (ITAD) and Technology Lifecycle Management
description: Total Technology provides sustainable technology disposal and lifecycle management solutions. They specialize in maximizing the return on decommissioned devices through buyback programs (TechCycling™), ensuring secure data destruction, managing responsible e-waste recycling, and handling program logistics. Their services help organizations maintain financial sustainability, data security, and environmental compliance when refreshing their technology.
products_services: Data Destruction (NIST, DoD, NAID AAA compliant)
Program Logistics (Secure shipping, white glove, box programs)
Deployment Services (Asset tagging, serial logging, device casing, delivery)
summary: Total Technology is an IT Asset Disposition (ITAD) company founded in 2011, specializing in comprehensive, sustainable technology lifecycle solutions. Their core mission is to help organizations—including enterprises, K-12 schools, government, healthcare, and non-profits—responsibly manage end-of-life technology. They offer a suite of interconnected services designed to maximize financial return, ensure data security, and promote environmental stewardship. Their flagship service, TechCycling™, focuses on buying back and remarketing decommissioned devices to fund new technology deployments. They complement this with certified data destruction (following NIST, DoD, and NAID standards), responsible e-waste recycling through an R2V3-certified partner network, and secure logistics management. The company emphasizes a consultative, technology-driven approach, using proprietary software and analytics to provide transparency and efficiency. With over 14 years of industry experience, they have processed more than 6.8 million devices and returned over $352 million to clients, establishing themselves as a partner for financially sustainable and compliant technology programs.
